ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Tecnologia.Business import Query from System.Web import HttpContext from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Genericos import GNPessoa clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") from Benner.Tecnologia.Wes.Components import MessageType from Benner.ERP.Comum import ErpEnvironment
valor = ErpEnvironment.ObterSessionVar("FORN_TERC_VINCULADO") if valor != None: ErpEnvironment.AtribuirSessionVar("FORN_TERC_VINCULADO", "") widget.MessagePanel.ShowMessage("Novo terceiro vinculado!", MessageType.Information)
